price: Vallë, a nuk jam unë më i mirë se ky i mjerë, i cili mezi mund të shprehet?
arabic: أَمۡ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ مَهِينٞ وَلَا يَكَادُ يُبِينُ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: am anā khayrun min hādhā alladhī huwa mahīnun walā yakādu yubīnu
